nodes.text: Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Rogue One?

Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Rogue One? is an article written by Mark Newbold on the Star Wars official site that gave the locations of the various worlds of the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. It took information from the Legends source The Essential Atlas and the canon sources Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide and Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?, with creative input from Jason Fry.
